channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Southern California man violently beaten in possible hate crime attack as suspect yells racial slurs

Pakistan claims India planning to attack within 36 hours as tension soars
item.description: Pakistan says India is planning to attack imminently in response to a deadly terrorist attack that Delhi blames on its nuclear armed neighbor.

item.title: Trump discusses first 100 days of historic presidency in exclusive ABC interview
item.description: President Trump issued a full-throated defense of his first 100 days in office during an exclusive interview Tuesday with ABC News.
